item.title: Skills
item.description: DEVELOPMENT SKILLS Skill Level Languages : Python, Groovy, C#, Kotlin, JavaScript/TypeScript, PHP, Java Expert Frameworks : Grails, Micronaut, Flask, ASP Core/MVC, Django, Leaf PHP, Laravel/Lumen, Spring Boot, Node JS Expert FrontEnd Tools: HTML5, Bootstrap, JQuery, Svelt Advanced Mobile Frameworks: Framework 7 (Svelt), Svelt Native, React Native, Android SDK Advanced CMS & Documentation : Grav, Hugo, Docusaurus, Jekyll Advanced Databases : SQL Server, PostgreSQL, MySQL, NoSQL (Redis, Mongo) Expert Development Methodologies : SCRUM, Kanban, Atlassian Suite, TDD, ICONIX Advanced Reporters: Jasper Report, Telerik Report, Crystal Reports Expert MATH & EDUCATION SKILLS Skill Level Mathematics : Probability & Statistics, Linear Algebra, Diferential Calculus, Discrete Math, Latex/Katex, Geogebra, Desmos, Scipy, SymPy, Octave Advanced Education: STEAM, Alternative Education, ELearning LMS (Canvas LMS, Moodle) Advanced DATA SCIENCE & ML SKILLS Skill Level Data Science : Pandas, PySpark, Knime, Apache Hive, Numpy, R Advanced Data Visualization & BI : Dash, Superset, Plotly, Seaborn, Matplotlib, Tableau Advanced Machine & Deep Learning : Scikit-Learn, Spark MLlib, NLKT, Keras Medium INFORMATION TECHNOLOGY SKILLS Skill Level DevOps & Clouding: Docker, MicroServices, Kubernates, AWS, GitOps, CI/CD, Azure, IBM Advanced OS and Web Servers : NGINX, Tomcat, IIS Server, Ubuntu, Centos, Apache Server Advanced Enterprise Architecture & Model: Archimate, UML, BPM, TOGAF Advanced Network & Internet of Things : LAN, AWS IoT, Raspberry Medium
